message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13500. This is a great price considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay $12000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $12500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's try to find a middle ground.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am still only able to commit to $12000 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
